name: Grimwald
description:
Grimwald is a game made by myself (everything but the music made by Félix Joubert) as a RPG fan who wanted to try to make his very own game in the genre.

The land of Grimwald was a green and peaceful place, but that was until a few days before you wake up with a terrible headache and very hazy memories in the streets of Welbert castle, a castle in the south of the region. Since then monsters and creatures have grown unrest, left their lands and are closing in into the realm of mans. Seems like you'll have to discover for yourself what you're doing here...

Features :

  • A real time combat system with a dodge mechanic 
  • Player can upgrade their character's statistics and skills by gaining levels and using particular skills/weapons
  •  Lots of quests to complete to help the inhabitants and learn about the world of Grimwald
  • A job system that rewards the player for crafting, the more you craft the better gear you get!

Planned features :

  • Overall graphical improvement (models, textures, etc...)
  • Controller support
  • Randomly generated dungeons
  • More enemies variety
  • Hair options

No idea about when the game will be updated and when the planned features will be implemented, as I'm working on the game in my free time.
